title: Johnny Manziel
summary: Johnathan Paul Manziel (/mænˈzɛl/ man-ZEL; born December 6, 1992) is an American gridiron football quarterback for the FCF Zappers of Fan Controlled Football (FCF).[note 1] He played two seasons with the Cleveland Browns of the National Football League (NFL) and was also a member of the Canadian Football League's (CFL) Hamilton Tiger-Cats and Montreal Alouettes in 2018 and the Alliance of American Football's (AAF) Memphis Express in 2019.
